fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Consumers, Taxation, Public Health
eu_initiatives: We are interested in the legislation with potential impact on beer industry in Czech Republic, especially audiovisual directives, tax directives and any European alcohol strategy.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Volunteering nutrition informations of brewers, Brewers of Europe meetings
goals__remit: We have given the world Pilsner Urquell, creating a new beer category, Pils. Nowadays we are at the forefront of the brewing industry in the Czech Republic and produce a number of popular brands. It is these brands that enable us to achieve our aim: to bring pleasure and enjoyment to beer lovers in the Czech Republic and all over the world.
